body: I think we should support `center` (either defaulting to `center-left` or to an error when it would have to slice unevenly), but `center-left` and `center-right` sound good too. Your recursive implementation looks good, except that it doesn't work for CUDA and shouldn't use index_select (slicing should be enough and will be muuuuuuuch faster). You can use `narrow`
